issue.title: [R] Implement bindings for stringr::regex
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14814](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14814). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14814?focusedCommentId=17474894) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This isn't required: these functions evaluate in stringr and we can (and do, and test) handle the objects they produce.
